Articles.Content:
Considering creating a new KSP channel and would like suggestions for a first mission

Thanks!
Well first of all, welcome to the Kerbal Space Program forums! For a first mission, maybe you could try doing a Career mode let's play?

Welcome to the forums!

Check out the challenges section of the forum, you may find some great ideas for a video there.
This work of a fan (for such it will prove to be) has been moved to Fan Works.
